@carolfoxlover @billpostmus An uphill fight for sure! Defending far more than GOP, in many tough states. We'll see, depends on Trump record.
@MohaveSteve Definitely an uphill fight for Dems! IN, MO, MT and ND all could swing GOP! Maybe more.
